scripts.pre-release: npm run build && rm -f chrome-to-roam.zip && mkdir -p chrome-to-roam && cp -R dist/* chrome-to-roam/ && zip -r chrome-to-roam.zip chrome-to-roam && rm -rf chrome-to-roam && echo 'Pre-release complete'
scripts.release:patch: npm run pre-release && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for patch release' && npm version patch && git push origin main --tags && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Patch release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Patch release process complete'
scripts.release:patch:force: npm run pre-release && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for patch release' && npm version patch --force && git push origin main --tags --force && gh release delete "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --yes || true && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Patch release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Forced patch release process complete'
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre-release && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for minor release' && npm version minor && git push origin main --tags && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Minor release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Minor release process complete'
scripts.release:minor:force: npm run pre-release && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for minor release' && npm version minor --force && git push origin main --tags --force && gh release delete "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --yes || true && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Minor release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Forced minor release process complete'
scripts.release:major: npm run pre-release && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for major release' && npm version major && git push origin main --tags && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Major release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Major release process complete'
scripts.release:major:force: npm run pre-release && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for major release' && npm version major --force && git push origin main --tags --force && gh release delete "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --yes || true && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Major release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Forced major release process complete'
